line.comment: * Check if the target ship still exists
* Mordan3 - Can no longer command a ship to capture a Jump beacon in systems you don't own, or if you already own too many jump beacons.
* hard or insane difficulty, can't have jump beacons in systems you don't own.
* Add-Ons 1.4.6: Allow unknown sectors as well except Renegade sector unless Renegades plot is completed.
* see https://x3.solasistim.net/index.php/Reputation/ for list of notoriety rankings and values.

line.text: 'Вы не можете захватывать прыжковые маяки в непринадлежащих вам системах, без достаточной репутации. Необходима репутация '
'Вы достигли максимально разрешенного количества прыжковых маяков.'

line.comment: * Capture the ship. Change its owner.
* Mordan2 - When capturing a ship manually with a capture ship command, attempt to send the captured ship home, just like a TUG.
* Change color to Blue (3) (because 'b' puts it at top of the sort list), except for beacons
* If we have a homebase set and it's a ship, send it home.
* owner is not the player. Nothing to do but exit.

sval.val: Вы не можете захватывать прыжковые маяки в непринадлежащих вам системах, без достаточной репутации. Необходима репутация
Вы достигли максимально разрешенного количества прыжковых маяков.

Check if the target ship still exists
Mordan3 - Can no longer command a ship to capture a Jump beacon in systems you don't own, or if you already own too many jump beacons.
hard or insane difficulty, can't have jump beacons in systems you don't own.
Add-Ons 1.3: updated for insane mode.
Add-Ons 1.4.6: Allow unknown sectors as well except Renegade sector unless Renegades plot is completed.
see https://x3.solasistim.net/index.php/Reputation/ for list of notoriety rankings and values.
Capture the ship. Change its owner.
Mordan2 - When capturing a ship manually with a capture ship command, attempt to send the captured ship home, just like a TUG.
Change color to Blue (3) (because 'b' puts it at top of the sort list), except for beacons
If we have a homebase set and it's a ship, send it home.
owner is not the player. Nothing to do but exit.
end Mordan2
